testsuite.name: Search for black running shoes and check size 10 availability on Nike.in

testcase.name: Search for black running shoes, verify size 10 availability, and add to cart
testcase.classname: Search for black running shoes and check size 10 availability on Nike.in

failure.message: Test execution halted as per user request. No further actions performed.

property.name: Proofs Base Folder, includes screenshots, recording, netwrok logs, api logs, sec logs, accessibility logs
plan
property.value: Step 1: (Skipped) Navigate to Nike India homepage, wait for full load, verify key visual signals, and close any promotional popup if present. Step 2: Activate the search input, type "black running shoes", submit the query, and verify that search results are displayed with expected product listings. Step 3: Click the first matching black running shoe from the results, verify product detail page loads with size options displayed. Step 4: Verify that size 10 is listed as available, select size 10, click "Add to Bag", and confirm the success indication. Step 5: Navigate to the cart page and assert that the black running shoe appears with size 10 and quantity 1.

testcase.system-out: Final Response: Test execution halted as per user request. No further actions performed.
